### Feature Slug

001-swaif-calc

### Declared Execution Type

Research Experiment

### Overview

Create a simple calculator application in Python with terminal input/output.

### Problem Statement

Users need a basic calculator that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division via the command line.

### Scope

- Command-line interface
- Four basic operations
- Input validation

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] AC-001 User can select operation
- [ ] AC-002 User can input numbers
- [ ] AC-003 Output is shown in terminal
- [ ] AC-004 Handles invalid input gracefully



### Constraints

- Must be implemented in Python
- No external dependencies

### Non-Goals

- No GUI
- No advanced math functions


### Implementation Hints (optional)

_No response_
